attributes.action: If a 'truth serum' exists, insist all those in and running for office, take it.
attributes.additional_details: If a truth serum exists, we should expect our politicians to have no concerns with taking it, to confirm their views are true and in the best interest of the country.
attributes.background: The level of lying and dishonesty in our political discourse has reached an unacceptable level. We expect more of our elected representatives and those that work closely with them. We deserve honesty from politicians and senior officials, and would have a stronger country if they were always honest.

rejection.details:
In any case, the Government or Parliament could not insist upon this. There's a petition about making it an offence for MPs to mislead the public. You could sign this petition if it calls for something you want to happen.

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/270648
